programs.name: Elementary Sewing

highlights.label: Hands-On Learning
highlights.description: Use real tools and materials from day one to practice sewing techniques.

highlights.label: Small Group
highlights.description: Personal attention and relaxed pace in a small class environment.

highlights.label: Make & Take Skirt
highlights.description: Create your own skirt at the end of the course and take it home.

programs.description: This is a 4-week program that teaches students how to sew a skirt. It is designed for students who are new to sewing and want to learn the basics of sewing.

items.title: Master basic seam techniques
items.blurb: Learn to sew straight seams with consistent seam allowance and proper finishing.

items.title: Choose appropriate fabrics
items.blurb: Understand different fabric types and select the right material for your project.

items.title: Work with grain lines
items.blurb: Identify and respect fabric grain to ensure proper fit and drape.

items.title: Thread selection and care
items.blurb: Select the right thread type and learn proper threading techniques.

items.title: Take accurate body measurements
items.blurb: Learn to measure waist, hip, and length for proper garment fitting.

items.title: Cut fabric accurately
items.blurb: Cut pattern pieces with precision and proper grain alignment.

items.title: Construct a complete skirt
items.blurb: Build a wearable skirt with darts, zipper, waistband, and hem finishing.

programs.name: Intermediate Sewing

highlights.label: Hands-On Learning
highlights.description: Use real tools and materials from day one to practice sewing techniques.

highlights.label: Small Group
highlights.description: Personal attention and relaxed pace in a small class environment.

highlights.label: Make & Take Blouse
highlights.description: Create your own blouse or skirt at the end of the course and take it home.

programs.description: This is a 4-week program that teaches students how to sew a blouse. It is designed for students who are new to sewing and want to learn the basics of sewing.

items.title: Take upper body measurements
items.blurb: Learn to measure bust, waist, shoulder width, and arm length for proper blouse fitting.

items.title: Understand sleeve construction
items.blurb: Learn sleeve types, armhole fitting, and sleeve attachment techniques.

items.title: Draft and fit sleeve patterns
items.blurb: Create sleeve patterns that fit properly with the armhole and body.

items.title: Work with different collar styles
items.blurb: Learn to construct various collar types including flat and stand-up collars.

items.title: Attach collars professionally
items.blurb: Master the techniques for clean, professional collar attachment.

items.title: Apply facings correctly
items.blurb: Learn to cut, sew, and attach facings for clean garment edges.

items.title: Achieve professional finishes
items.blurb: Master techniques for clean edges, proper pressing, and final touches.

items.title: Create blouse pattern
items.blurb: Draft a complete blouse pattern incorporating all learned techniques.

items.title: Construct a complete blouse
items.blurb: Build a professional blouse with sleeves, collar, facings, and proper finishing.
